channel.title: How to port forward
channel.description: Ok so i am currently making my first rs-ps can someone tell me what else i need to do and how to portforward im kinda stuck there. i have winrar. i have no-ip all set up and downloaded. i have utorrent. i have my path and the other path set up. on utorrent i have gone to the options things put in the port it said to on this tut and clicked apply and ok. i dont have a client and source. can someone please tell me what i need to do now? lead me to a tutorial and tell me what step to start on or somthing. can you send me a link to a video of how to port forward with utorrent? also if you know a good client / souce post a link please help asap.

item.title: How to port forward
item.dc:creator: @zadehogan zadehogan
item.description:
@zadehogan wrote:

www.portforward.com and then just follow the steps.

Read full topic

item.title: How to port forward
item.dc:creator: @Lucas7 Lucas7
item.description:
@Lucas7 wrote:

uTorrent is actually pretty helpful with portforwading.

But… You usually have to portforward on your router before using uTorrent.

Read full topic

item.description:

uTorrent sucks when you’re portforwarding…

item.title: How to port forward
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

For a client or source click here (just look through them till you find one that you like)
And for a portforwarding tutorial you can either go here or you can just use your uTorrent one.

Read full topic

item.title: How to port forward

item.description:
